name: Gabrielle's Sweet Defense
description:
Hey! Gabrielle here! We were going to have a party here in Monsterville, but the desserts that Crystal the witch made attracted some unwanted guests: Humans!

We've gotta send these pesky humans back to the mortal world so we can get this party started!

■ Innovative three-line tower defense game!

The humans are attacking us from three fronts! Everyone in Monsterville is helping us in any way they can, from Vlad the vampire to even my cat Lola!

■ Upgrade your characters!

The more we fight the humans, the more powerful we can become! Maybe if we get poweful enough, we'll get new costumes!

■ Play through 50 stages!
